all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For, verily, the sound must go forth from this place into all the world, and unto the uttermost parts of the earth—the gospel must be preached unto every creature, with signs following them that believe.
Doctrine and Covenants 58:64
Quote of the Day
"We cannot look to and focus upon Jesus Christ as the “mark” if we only see ourselves."
David A. Bednar | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
